climatePledgeFriendly.details: U.S. EPA Safer Choice certified products contain safer ingredients for human health and the environment.

features: 1st plant-based detergent with the cleaning power of Tide (75% plant-based)

Formula made with 100% renewable wind power electricity* at a zero manufacturing waste to landfill site.*The same facility also uses steam power; electricity represents approximately 50% of total energy used
Free of dyes, chlorine, phosphates or optical brighteners
Suitable for both High Efficiency (HE) and regular washers
USDA Certified Tide liquid laundry detergent
With a pleasant honey lavender scent
body.description: Tide purclean Honey Lavender is the first and only plant-based liquid laundry detergent with the trusted cleaning power of Tide. Manufactured at a site that uses 100% renewable wind power electricity and sends zero manufacturing waste to landfill, this eco-friendly detergent offers a simple way to integrate more sustainable choices into your everyday laundry routine without compromising on cleaning performance. Tide purclean delivers outstanding stain removal, even in energy-saving cold water and quick wash cycle. Additionally, it comes free of dyes, chlorine and phosphates, and is formulated so as to replace most of the non-renewable active ingredients with their plant-based alternatives. Plus, it has a light Honey Lavender fragrance to keep your clothes smelling fresh and clean. Finally, Plant-Based Power that Cleans Like Tide.* EPA/Safer Choice recognition does not constitute endorsement of this product. The Safer Choice label signifies that the formula for this product, as Tide has represented it to the EPA, contains ingredients with more positive health and environmental characteristics than conventional products. EPA/Safer Choice relies solely on Tide, its integrity and good faith, for information on the composition, ingredients, and attributes of this product. EPA/Safer Choice has not independently identified, i.e., via chemical analysis, the ingredients in the product formula, nor evaluated any of Tide's non-ingredient claims. EPA/Safer Choice provides its evaluation only as to the environmental and human health characteristics of the product, based on currently available information and scientific understanding.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells nice and is gentle on skin!
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE all of the good smelling things, BUT they don’t always seem to love my skin back. Recently noticed my kiddo and I are super sensitive to fabric softeners and even some detergents. I’m not BIG on natural and plant based products - but I do like using them when I can. Especially in hygiene and health. This detergent is plant based AND smells great. I find the smell to be sort of fruity and floral and sweet. For a plant based product, the scent really lasts too! I usually like trying new things, but I think I’ve found our new pereferred detergent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great option for an unscented soap your if your sensitive to smells, this is a great option. A little goes a long way!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the smell
reviews.reviewText: Before I bought this I read that some people thought the smell was overpowering, but I haven’t had that issue. I think the scent is nice and floral/clean, sometimes the smell is apparent out of the wash, but once the clothes are dry it’s perfect. I also appreciate that it’s more eco friendly than other options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like this product and it gets clothes clean and seems to make them soft. Definitely not a harsh cleanser. It has become my preferred product for my own laundry and my kids started using it as well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smells great, if you like scented detergent. No skin issues in our household, but we don’t have anyone who has super sensitive skin requiring special detergent. Still wondering how eco-friendly and non-toxic it is though - doesn’t show up on any “best of” exo-friendly or non-toxic lists…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best smelling plant based detergent.
reviews.reviewText: The honey lavender smells great and does not over power your senses like other detergents. I think this is a smart choice for a consumer who is trying to make greener choices in life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice plant based laundry soap
reviews.reviewText: I enjoy the smell of this. Love plant based laundry and this is great! Will be buying more. Too bad I can’t be sponsored from Tide 🤣

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the scent and it works as normal-excellent!

No es tan tóxico y agresivoSin embargo creo que todavía contiene dioxane. Este ingrediente está prohibo en otros países por ser carcinogeno. .Parece todos detergentes en Mexico contienen dioxane/veneno.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buena opción para personas con dermatitis!
reviews.reviewText: Mi dermatóloga me recomendó usar detergente sin olor para mi ropa ya que probablemente los que contienen perfumes y otros químicos me estaban haciendo daño, probé esta opción y ha sido muy buena. Al abrir el bote huele como a resistol, pero ya que se lava tu ropa en realidad no queda ningún olor en ella y queda igual de limpia.
Product goes to normal catogary...not too much excitement Felt.Works as a ordinary detergents.It tooks More than 1month to reach in hand

reviews.reviewTitle: Si eres de piel sensible es toda una opción!
reviews.reviewText: Me encanta todo lo de la marca Tide, para mi es lo mejor del mercado. Quizás es un poco más caro a otros productos. Pero si consideras que tu piel no se va irritar y que tu ropa en verdad queda limpia y suave debes entonces comprar. Dura mucho, con seguir las instrucciones de la taza medidora no se desperdicia nada. Lo recomiendo!

reviews.reviewTitle: Cleans great with a light fresh scent
reviews.reviewText: I've been using Tide Purclean laundry detergent for a while, and love the fresh lavender scent and how well it cleans in my 'he' washer, but I was buying it in the regular plastic bottles. Then I came across this on the Amazon site, thought I'd give it a try, and I must say I'm really impressed. Same great detergent but in an ecologically friendly package which uses much less plastic and is very convenient to use. Highly recommended.
